english.segment1: I try to please you and make you love me. I gave you all my heart and all you had to do is give. Yours back to me found you refuse me. So I send it up to hell and heaven hear my heart. Je' vous aime, Je' vous aime, my heart. Je' vous aime, Je' vous aime, Heaven hear my heart, heaven hear my heart, Heaven hear my heart, heaven hear my heart, hear my heart. Heaven hear my heart, heaven hear my heart, hear my heart
english.segment2: You dont understand what it's like for me. Highers pounding, now I'm shaking out the knees, I wanna do good and make you happy. Hoping that you like me when you hear this singing heaven. Je' vous aime, Je' vous aime, Je' vous aime, Je' vous aime, my heart. Heaven hear my heart, heaven hear my heart,
english.segment3: Heaven hear my heart, heaven hear my heart, hear my heart. Heaven hear my heart, heaven hear my heart, hear my heart. Je' vous aime, I do you every part, heaven hear my heart. Je' vous aime, Je' vous aime, Je' vous aime, Je' vous aime, my heart. Je' vous aime, Je' vous aime, Je' vous aime, Je' vous aime, my heart. Heaven hear my heart, heaven hear my heart, Heaven hear my heart, heaven hear my heart, hear my heart. Heaven hear my heart, heaven hear my heart, hear my heart. I know to hear me I want, hear my heart. I won't loose, I won't loose, so hear me. Heaven hear my heart, heaven hear my heart, heaven hear my heart, hear my heart.
